findings.title: Potentially unlimited indemnification
findings.rationale: Indemnity obligations may be uncapped, which can expose you to costs far beyond the contract value.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY Provider's liability is unlimited for indemnification, confidentiality, and intellectual property claims....
findings.context:
l indemnify Client against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limitation, arising from Provider's breach of this Agreement.

5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
Provider's liability is unlimited for indemnification, confidentiality, and intellectual property claims.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION
Client may terminate immediately upon written notice. Provider requires 45 days notice.

findings.title: Confidentiality may be perpetual / indefinite
findings.rationale: Indefinite confidentiality can create long-term compliance burden and uncertainty around retention and disclosure.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...7. CONFIDENTIALITY Confidentiality obligations are perpetual and continue indefinitely after termination....

ility is unlimited for indemnification, confidentiality, and intellectual property claims.

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.

fications in the Statement of Work.

9. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
All disputes must be resolved through binding arbitration under the rules of the American Arbitration Association.

10. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by California law, and parties submit to exclusive jurisdiction in California courts.

findings.title: Late fees / high interest
findings.rationale: Penalty terms can increase costs if payment timing slips.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...2. PAYMENT TERMS Payment is due within 25 days. Interest on overdue amounts accrues at 1% per month....
findings.exact_snippet: Interest on overdue amounts accrues at 1%

rvice Provider ("Provider") and Client Company ("Client").

1. SERVICES
Provider agrees to provide the services described in attached Statements of Work.

2. PAYMENT TERMS
Payment is due within 25 days. Interest on overdue amounts accrues at 1% per month.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All intellectual property developed under this Agreement shall be owned by Client. Provider hereby assigns all such rights to Client.
